Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Chimera Tank
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
An infantry fighting vehicle used by the Imperial Guard. It is able to transport twelve soldiers into battle, then cover them with a twin-linked heavy bolter on top and a heavy bolter mounted to the turret. 

Guardsmen carried by a Chimera are sometimes referred to as an “Armored Fist” squad. The Armageddon Steel Legion are a regiment of such squads, riding into battle inside their Chimeras and then deploying under fire to overwhelm the shattered defenders. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x12
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
